description: This header file declares the LocalStore class, which implements the ILocalStore interface. It provides methods for managing a local database store, including opening the database, creating tables, setting entry limits, retrieving entry counts and entries, removing entries, and adding entries. The class utilizes a DatabaseConnection object and manages database interactions using SQLite.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: Implements the ILocalStore interface for managing a local SQLite database, providing methods for database operations such as opening, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving and removing entries, and adding entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the database at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the database with the given name.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets the entry limit for a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the number of entries in a table within a specified range.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Fetches a list of entries from a table starting from a specific index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
